name: Sandshrew
flavorText:
Burrows deep
underground in
arid locations far from water.
It only emerges
to hunt for food.

pokemon.name: Sandslash
pokemon.flavorText:
Curls up into a
spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while
curled up to
attack or escape.
